text: 15.22: Ru 15.32; Ef 2.1; 2.5; 5.14; VB 3.1Ana maaŋ wo ndia ga nzuaim, ana ndia ana mbararavram, mbaram won ŋaara gumgir kamgiap khaŋ mbe nzuai, ‘Nde vhemkora ŋgɨp nan shaa vhuun mpeeŋra ndigi zɨv ana sharari. Nde mba shaar ana sharav, mbaram ŋgɨp, farve shari ring ndigi zɨp, ana farve sharav, ŋgɨp ŋkari sharive ndigi zɨv, ana ŋkarveni sharari.
